DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety, immunogenicity and tolerability of TBE vaccines administered to children.
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Safety, Tolerability and Immune Response of TBE Vaccines Administered to Healthy Children
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and female children, 1 to 10 years of age. Subjects with documented evidence of TBE Subjects, who have been previously vaccinated against TBE
